title: Stock certificates and share transfer documents
dataVerified: Shareholder name, number of shares, certificate number, company name, issue date, transfer agent, CUSIP number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Ornate certificate format. High-value assets. Prevents forgery. Domain binding verifies legitimate issuer and transfer agent. Critical for private company share transfers and estate settlements. Physical certificates can remain in safe deposit boxes while verification happens digitally.
